plot: A young girl is mysteriously summoned to the house of an abusive fisherman, when all her attempts at escape fail she is left with no choice, but to reclaim her true, magical identity.
title: Selkie
plot_es: A young girl is mysteriously summoned to the house of an abusive fisherman, when all her attempts at escape fail she is left with no choice, but to reclaim her true, magical identity.
